summary.para: Initializes a client proxy, binding it to the specified RPC channel.

param.name: pRpcChannelBuffer
param.para: A pointer to the interface that the proxy uses to marshal data.

returns.para: This method can return the standard return values E_INVALIDARG, E_OUTOFMEMORY, E_UNEXPECTED, E_FAIL, and S_OK.

summary.para: Disconnects a client proxy from any RPC channel to which it is connected.
Controls the RPC proxy used to marshal data between COM components.
